channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bitcoin gains as Trump reportedly plans crypto executive order
item.description: Bitcoin rejoined the crypto rally amid reports that President-elect Donald Trump could release an executive order on crypto as soon as day 1.

item.title: Here are 11 things Trump has promised to carry out on Day 1 of his presidency
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has promised significant changes when he takes office on everything from immigration to foreign policy to tariffs.

item.title: Vanguard to pay more than $100 million to SEC over violations involving target date retirement funds
item.description: The payment stems from a 2020 change by Vanguard that led to redemptions in one class of target date funds.

item.title: Ozempic is in the next round of Medicare drug price negotiations. See the full list of 15 medications
item.description: The talks on drugs including Novo Nordisk's Wegovy, GSK's Trelegy Ellipta, and Pfizer's Xtandi will set Medicare prices that go into effect in 2027.

item.title: Starbucks’s turnaround plan under new CEO now likely includes job cuts
item.description: Coffee chain Starbucks’s promised overhaul may require cutting jobs as it tries to work more efficiently, CEO Brian Niccol said.

item.title: DOJ sues Walgreens, alleging it 'knowingly' filled millions of prescriptions that lacked legitimate medical purposes
item.description: Some Walgreens patients died of overdose shortly after getting invalid prescriptions filled at Walgreens, the DOJ alleges in the new lawsuit.
